member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.RemindLaterFormat
member.summary: Enum representing the remind later time span.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.RemindLaterFormat.Minutes
member.summary: Represents the time span in minutes.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.RemindLaterFormat.Hours
member.summary: Represents the time span in hours.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.RemindLaterFormat.Days
member.summary: Represents the time span in days.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.Mode
member.summary: Enum representing the effect of Mandatory flag.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.Mode.Normal
member.summary: In this mode, it ignores Remind Later and Skip values set previously and hide both buttons.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.Mode.Forced
member.summary: In this mode, it won't show close button in addition to Normal mode behaviour.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.Mode.ForcedDownload
member.summary: In this mode, it will start downloading and applying update without showing standard update dialog in addition to Forced mode behaviour.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater
member.summary: Main class that lets you auto update applications by setting some static fields and executing its Start method.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.InstalledVersion
member.summary: You can set this field to your current version if you don't want to determine the version from the assembly.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.DownloadPath
member.summary: Set it to folder path where you want to download the update file. If not provided then it defaults to Temp folder.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.InstallationPath
member.summary: If you are using a zip file as an update file then you can set this value to path where your app is installed. This is only necessary when your installation directory differs from your executable path.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.AppTitle
member.summary: Set the Application Title shown in Update dialog. Although AutoUpdater.NET will get it automatically, you can set this property if you like to give custom Title.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.AppCastURL
member.summary: URL of the xml file that contains information about latest version of the application.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.FtpCredentials
member.summary: Login/password/domain for FTP-request

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.OpenDownloadPage
member.summary: Opens the download URL in default browser if true. Very usefull if you have portable application.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.BasicAuthDownload
member.summary: Set Basic Authentication credentials required to download the file.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.BasicAuthXML
member.summary: Set Basic Authentication credentials required to download the XML file.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.BasicAuthChangeLog
member.summary: Set Basic Authentication credentials to navigate to the change log URL.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.HttpUserAgent
member.summary: Set the User-Agent string to be used for HTTP web requests.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ShowSkipButton
member.summary: If this is true users can see the skip button.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ShowRemindLaterButton
member.summary: If this is true users can see the Remind Later button.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.LetUserSelectRemindLater
member.summary: If this is true users see dialog where they can set remind later interval otherwise it will take the interval from RemindLaterAt and RemindLaterTimeSpan fields.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.RemindLaterAt
member.summary: Remind Later interval after user should be reminded of update.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ReportErrors
member.summary: AutoUpdater.NET will report errors if this is true.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.RunUpdateAsAdmin
member.summary: Set this to false if your application doesn't need administrator privileges to replace the old version.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.Synchronous
member.summary: Set this to true if you want to run update check synchronously.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.Mandatory
member.summary: Set this to true if you want to ignore previously assigned Remind Later and Skip settings. It will also hide Remind Later and Skip buttons.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.UpdateMode
member.summary: Set this to any of the available modes to change behaviour of the Mandatory flag.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.Proxy
member.summary: Set Proxy server to use for all the web requests in AutoUpdater.NET.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.PersistenceProvider
member.summary: Set this to an instance implementing the IPersistenceProvider interface for using a data storage method different from the default Windows Registry based one.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.RemindLaterTimeSpan
member.summary: Set if RemindLaterAt interval should be in Minutes, Hours or Days.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ApplicationExitEventHandler
member.summary: A delegate type to handle how to exit the application after update is downloaded.

member.name: E:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ApplicationExitEvent
member.summary: An event that developers can use to exit the application gracefully.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.CheckForUpdateEventHandler
member.summary: A delegate type for hooking up update notifications.
member.param: An object containing all the parameters received from AppCast XML file. If there will be an error while looking for the XML file then this object will be null.

member.name: E:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.CheckForUpdateEvent
member.summary: An event that clients can use to be notified whenever the update is checked.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ParseUpdateInfoHandler
member.summary: A delegate type for hooking up parsing logic.
member.param: An object containing the AppCast file received from server.

member.name: E:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ParseUpdateInfoEvent
member.summary: An event that clients can use to be notified whenever the AppCast file needs parsing.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.UpdateFormSize
member.summary: Set if you want the default update form to have a different size.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.Start(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Start checking for new version of application and display a dialog to the user if update is available.
member.param: Assembly to use for version checking.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.Start(System.String,System.Net.NetworkCredential,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Start checking for new version of application via FTP and display a dialog to the user if update is available.
member.param: FTP URL of the xml file that contains information about latest version of the application.
Credentials required to connect to FTP server.
Assembly to use for version checking.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.Start(System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Start checking for new version of application and display a dialog to the user if update is available.
member.param: URL of the xml file that contains information about latest version of the application.
Assembly to use for version checking.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.Exit
member.summary: Detects and exits all instances of running assembly, including current.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.DownloadUpdate(AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs)
member.summary: Opens the Download window that download the update and execute the installer when download completes.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ShowUpdateForm(AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs)
member.summary: Shows standard update dialog.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.BasicAuthentication
member.summary: Provides Basic Authentication header for web request.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.BasicAuthentication.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes credentials for Basic Authentication.

Password to use for Basic Authentication

member.summary: Provides Custom Authentication header for web request.

member.summary: Initializes authorization header value for Custom Authentication
member.param: Value to use as http request header authorization value

member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.

member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.IAuthentication
member.summary: Interface for authentication

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.IAuthentication.Apply(AutoUpdaterDotNET.MyWebClient@)
member.summary: Apply the authentication to webclient.
member.param: WebClient for which you want to use this authentication method.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.IPersistenceProvider
member.summary: Provides a mechanism for storing AutoUpdater state between sessions.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.IPersistenceProvider.GetSkippedVersion
member.summary: Reads the flag indicating whether a specific version should be skipped or not.
member.returns: Returns a version to skip. If skip value is false or not present then it will return null.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.IPersistenceProvider.GetRemindLater
member.summary: Reads the value containing the date and time at which the user must be given again the possibility to upgrade the application.
member.returns: Returns a DateTime value at which the user must be given again the possibility to upgrade the application. If remind later value is not present then it will return null.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.IPersistenceProvider.SetSkippedVersion(System.Version)
member.summary: Sets the values indicating the specific version that must be ignored by AutoUpdater.
member.param: Version code for the specific version that must be ignored. Set it to null if you don't want to skip any version.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.IPersistenceProvider.SetRemindLater(System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Sets the date and time at which the user must be given again the possibility to upgrade the application.
member.param: Date and time at which the user must be given again the possibility to upgrade the application.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.JsonFilePersistenceProvider
member.summary: Provides a mechanism for storing AutoUpdater state between sessions on a Json formatted file.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.JsonFilePersistenceProvider.FileName
member.summary: Path for the Json formatted file.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.JsonFilePersistenceProvider.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the JsonFilePersistenceProvider class.
member.remarks: The path for the Json formatted file must be specified using the FileName property.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.JsonFilePersistenceProvider.Save
member.summary: Stores applied modifications into the Json formatted file specified in the FileName property.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.JsonFilePersistenceProvider.ReadFile
member.summary: Reads a Json formatted file and returns an initialized instance of the class PersistedValues.
member.remarks: The function creates a new instance, initialized with default parameters, in case the file does not exist.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.PersistedValues
member.summary: Provides way to serialize and deserialize AutoUpdater persisted values.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.PersistedValues.SkippedVersion
member.summary: Application version to be skipped.
member.remarks: The SetSkippedVersion function sets this property and calls the Save() method for making changes permanent.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.PersistedValues.RemindLaterAt
member.summary: Date and time at which the user must be given again the possibility to upgrade the application.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.MyWebClient.ResponseUri
member.summary: Response Uri after any redirects.

member.summary: Provides credentials for Network Authentication.

member.summary: Initializes credentials for Network Authentication.
member.param: Username to use for Network Authentication

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs
member.summary: Object of this class gives you all the details about the update useful in handling the update logic yourself.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.IsUpdateAvailable
member.summary: If new update is available then returns true otherwise false.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.Error
member.summary: If there is an error while checking for update then this property won't be null.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.DownloadURL
member.summary: Download URL of the update file.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.ChangelogURL
member.summary: URL of the webpage specifying changes in the new update.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.CurrentVersion
member.summary: Returns newest version of the application available to download.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.InstalledVersion
member.summary: Returns version of the application currently installed on the user's PC.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.Mandatory
member.summary: Shows if the update is required or optional.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.InstallerArgs
member.summary: Command line arguments used by Installer.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.CheckSum
member.summary: Checksum of the update file.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.Mandatory
member.summary: Mandatory class to fetch the XML values related to Mandatory field.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.Mandatory.Value
member.summary: Value of the Mandatory field.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.Mandatory.MinimumVersion
member.summary: If this is set and 'Value' property is set to true then it will trigger the mandatory update only when current installed version is less than value of this property.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.Mandatory.UpdateMode
member.summary: Mode that should be used for this update.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.CheckSum
member.summary: Checksum class to fetch the XML values for checksum.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.CheckSum.Value
member.summary: Hash of the file.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.CheckSum.HashingAlgorithm
member.summary: Hash algorithm that generated the hash.
